    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030301</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Marea negra</string>
            <string language="en">Oil spills</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ölstreuungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Flaques d'huile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Derramamentos do óleo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cadute dell'olio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαρροές πετρελαίου</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Investigación sobre los vertidos de petróleo al mar. El alumno deberá realizar una presentación digital. Para ello, antes debe contestar unas, utilizando como fuente de información las direcciones recomendadas.</string>
            <string language="en">Research on oil spills at sea. The student must carry out a digital presentation. In order to do this, they must first answer some questions, using the recommended addresses as information sources.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geología</string>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Marea negra</string>
            <string language="en">Oil spills</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Forschung auf Ölstreuungen am Meer. Der 
Kursteilnehmer muß eine digitale Darstellung durchführen. 
Zwecks dies tun, müssen sie einige Fragen mit den empfohlenen 
Adressen als Informationsquellen zuerst beantworten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Recherche sur des flaques d'huile en mer. 
L'étudiant doit effectuer une présentation digitale. 
Afin de faire ceci, ils doivent d'abord répondre à quelques 
questions, en utilisant les adresses recommandées comme émetteurs 
d'informations.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pesquisa sobre derramamentos do óleo no mar. 
O estudante deve realizar uma apresentação digital. A 
fim fazer isto, devem primeiramente responder a algumas perguntas, 
usando os endereços recomendados como fontes de informação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ricerca sulle cadute dell'olio in mare. 
L'allievo deve effettuare una presentazione digitale. Per 
per fare questo, devono in primo luogo rispondere ad alcune domande, 
usando gli indirizzi suggeriti come sorgenti di informazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έρευνα για τις διαρροές πετρελαίου εν πλω. Ο 
σπουδαστής πρέπει να πραγματοποιήσει μια ψηφιακή παρουσίαση. 
Προκειμένου να γίνει αυτό, πρέπει πρώτα να απαντήσουν σε 
μερικές ερωτήσεις, χρησιμοποιώντας τις συνιστώμενες διευθύνσεις 
ως πηγές πληροφοριών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ölstreuungen</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
